Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.views

package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.views

  • Class
    Description
    AccountCreationOptions
    The AccountCreationOptions class represents a view for choosing the type of account to create in the CLI application.
    BuyerActivities
    The BuyerActivities class represents the view for displaying and managing buyer activities in the CLI application.
    BuyerActivities.BuyerMetrics
    A record class representing buyer metrics, including recent and total orders, recent and total products bought, the number of products liked, average recent reviews, average total reviews, recent reviews, and total reviews.
    BuyerCreationForm
    The BuyerCreationForm class represents a view for creating a new buyer account in the CLI application.
    BuyerMenu
    The BuyerMenu class represents the main menu for a buyer user in the CLI application.
    BuyerOrdersMenu
    The BuyerOrdersMenu class represents the view for displaying and interacting with a buyer's order history and details in the client CLI application.
    BuyerProfile
    The BuyerProfile class represents the view for displaying and updating buyer profile information in the client CLI application.
    BuyersDisplay
    The BuyersDisplay class represents the view for displaying information about buyers in the client CLI application.
    Cart
    The Cart class represents the view for managing the shopping cart in the client CLI application.
    LoginForm
    The LoginForm class represents the login form view of the client CLI application.
    MainMenu
    The MainMenu class represents the main menu view of the client CLI application.
    OfferProduct
    The OfferProduct class represents a view for offering a new product in the client CLI application.
    OrderExchangeMenu
    The OrderExchangeMenu class represents a view for handling order exchanges in the client CLI.
    OrderPlacement
    The OrderPlacement class represents a view for placing an order in the client CLI application.
    PendingSellerOrders
    The PendingSellerOrders class represents a view for displaying and managing pending orders from buyers to be shipped by the logged-in seller.
    ProductExchangeMenu
    The ProductExchangeMenu class represents a view for handling product exchanges in the client CLI.
    ProductReturnMenu
    The ProductReturnMenu class represents a view for handling product returns in the client CLI.
    ProductReview
    The ProductReview class represents a view for submitting a review for a specific product.
    ProductReviews
    The ProductReviews class represents a view for displaying reviews of a specific product.
    ProductSearch
    The ProductSearch class represents a view for searching and displaying products based on keyword matches.
    ProductsMenu
    The ProductsMenu class represents a view for displaying and interacting with products.
    SellerActivities
    The SellerActivities class represents the view for displaying and managing seller activities in the CLI application.
    SellerActivities.SellerMetrics
    A record class representing seller metrics, including recent and total revenue, recent and total products sold, the number of products offered, average recent product rating, and average total product rating.
    SellerCreationForm
    The SellerCreationForm class represents a view for creating a new seller account.
    SellerMenu
    The SellerMenu class represents a view for displaying and managing various actions available to a seller.
    SellerProfile
    The SellerProfile class represents a view for managing and updating a seller's profile information.
    SellersDisplay
    The SellersDisplay class represents a view for displaying information about sellers and interacting with seller-related functionalities.
    TicketCreation
    The TicketCreation class represents a view for creating a ticket in the client CLI.
    TicketDisplay
    The TicketDisplay class represents a view for displaying and performing actions on a specific ticket.
    TicketsMenu
    The TicketsMenu class represents a view for displaying and interacting with user tickets.
    UserFinder
    The UserFinder class represents a view for searching and displaying information about buyers and sellers.
    View
    The View class is an abstract base class for implementing views in the CLI application.
    ViewRenderer
    The ViewRenderer class is responsible for managing the rendering of views in the CLI application.
